languages.text: "Торбальд прав. Разрушения от штурма не сравнятся с уроном, который наносит миру каждая секунда нашего промедления".
"Thorbald is right. However destructive the assault might end up being, it will be nothing compared to the damage that every moment of our hesitation does to the planet."
languages.original_text: "Торбальд прав. Разрушения от штурма не сравнятся с уроном, который наносит миру каждая секунда нашего промедления".

traits.locale_text: "Thorbald is right. However destructive the assault might end up being, it will be nothing compared to the damage that every moment of our hesitation does to the planet."
"Thorbald is right. However destructive the assault might end up being, it will be nothing compared to the damage that every moment of our hesitation does to the planet."

"Thorbald is right. However destructive the assault might end up being, it will be nothing compared to the damage that every moment of our hesitation does to the planet."

languages.text: “索巴德说得没错。这次攻击或许确实会造成破坏，可我们若总是犹犹豫豫不肯进攻，那我们造成的破坏，与这颗行星时时刻刻受到的破坏相比，简直微不足道。”
languages.original_text: "Thorbald is right. However destructive the assault might end up being, it will be nothing compared to the damage that every moment of our hesitation does to the planet."

traits.locale_text: “索巴德说得没错。这次攻击或许确实会造成破坏，可我们若总是犹犹豫豫不肯进攻，那我们造成的破坏，与这颗行星时时刻刻受到的破坏相比，简直微不足道。”

languages.text: « Thorbald a raison. L'assaut sera peut-être destructeur, mais ce n'est rien à côté des dégâts causés à la planète par cette trop longue hésitation. »
languages.original_text: "Thorbald is right. However destructive the assault might end up being, it will be nothing compared to the damage that every moment of our hesitation does to the planet."

traits.locale_text: « Thorbald a raison. L'assaut sera peut-être destructeur, mais ce n'est rien à côté des dégâts causés à la planète par cette trop longue hésitation. »

languages.text: 「トールバルドの言うとおりだ。襲撃がいかに破壊的なものに終わろうとも、我々の一瞬の躊躇が惑星に与える損害に比べればたいしたことはない」
languages.original_text: "Thorbald is right. However destructive the assault might end up being, it will be nothing compared to the damage that every moment of our hesitation does to the planet."

traits.locale_text: 「トールバルドの言うとおりだ。襲撃がいかに破壊的なものに終わろうとも、我々の一瞬の躊躇が惑星に与える損害に比べればたいしたことはない」

languages.text: «Thorbald tiene razón. Por muy desolador que acabe siendo el asalto, no será nada en comparación del daño que le hace nuestra indecisión al planeta».
languages.original_text: "Thorbald is right. However destructive the assault might end up being, it will be nothing compared to the damage that every moment of our hesitation does to the planet."

traits.locale_text: «Thorbald tiene razón. Por muy desolador que acabe siendo el asalto, no será nada en comparación del daño que le hace nuestra indecisión al planeta».

languages.text: "Thorbald hat recht. So zerstörerisch der Angriff letztlich auch sein mag, es ist nichts gegen die Schäden, die jeder Augenblick unseres Zögerns dem Planeten zufügt."
languages.original_text: "Thorbald is right. However destructive the assault might end up being, it will be nothing compared to the damage that every moment of our hesitation does to the planet."

traits.locale_text: "Thorbald hat recht. So zerstörerisch der Angriff letztlich auch sein mag, es ist nichts gegen die Schäden, die jeder Augenblick unseres Zögerns dem Planeten zufügt."

languages.text: "Thorbald haklı. Taarruz ne denli yıkıcı olursa olsun tereddüt ettiğimiz her an kâfirlerin gezegene verdiği zararla boy ölçüşemez."
languages.original_text: "Thorbald is right. However destructive the assault might end up being, it will be nothing compared to the damage that every moment of our hesitation does to the planet."
